item.title: How do i get ::master to work?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

here is mine and it only masters melee stats so my admins and mods still have to work on skills

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && (playerRights >= 1)) { // master by Butter addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); sendMessage("Butter Has Trained U to A Master"); }

item.title: How do i get ::master to work?
item.dc:creator: @DrPepper DrPepper
item.description:
@DrPepper wrote:

Add this udner custom commands

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(538000000, 0); addSkillXP(538910000, 1); addSkillXP(538100000, 2); addSkillXP(538100000, 3); addSkillXP(538100000, 4); addSkillXP(538100000, 5); addSkillXP(538100000, 6); addSkillXP(538100000, 7); addSkillXP(538100000, 8); addSkillXP(538100000, 9); addSkillXP(538100000, 10); addSkillXP(538100000, 11); addSkillXP(538100000, 12); addSkillXP(538100000, 13); addSkillXP(538100000, 14); addSkillXP(538100000, 15); addSkillXP(538100000, 16); addSkillXP(538100000, 17); addSkillXP(538100000, 18); addSkillXP(538100000, 19); addSkillXP(538100000, 20); addSkillXP(538100000, 21); addSkillXP(538100000, 22); addSkillXP(538100000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" has just mastered."); }
